item.description:
Are you looking for something FUN to do Saturday night? You
are invited to join 2 other meetup groups for Pizza, Drinks,
and LOTS of dancing! at Polcari's ( in the lounge) on Rt 1 in Saugus!


OOPS, I almost forgot! NO COVER CHARGE



EVENT DESCRIPTION:
Last time we really had such a great time dancing to the songs we know all the words to!
Check out the photos! Many hits from the 50'S, 60's, 70's and more.
The band members are very sociable, sat with us. We even had fun and played some R&R trivia
with them!
For those of you who were unable to join us, this is an event not to be missed!
** POLCARI'S LOUNGE does get VERY crowded...especially when this band is in the house1
But, if you aren't into crowds, this may not be the right venue for you.

The band's website: www.reminisants.com

TIME: 8pm ( music begins at 9)
WHERE: We will be in the lounge
item.how_to_find_us: Ask for the meetup group in the lounge. Also, our meetup table sign
item.name: "A Blast From The Past" - The Reminisants Are back
